mapper.insert: insert into DATA_PACKAGE_SUB (SUB_PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_SIZE, CREATE_TIME) values (#{subPackageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packageSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select SUB_PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_ID, PACKAGE_SIZE, CREATE_TIME from DATA_PACKAGE_SUB
